oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Truth Or Consequences - 1942-12-12 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Truth Or Consequences game show from December 12, 1942, part 1. Hosted by Ralph Edwards with announcer Ed Herlihy and contestants Robert Fleming, Al Zudek, John Martin, Jean Steenhoff, David Bloom, and Beatrice Bloom (contestant names unconfirmed). Laura Dean Dutton, star of Broadway musical New Faces Of 1943, sings the Ivory Soap jingles. Sponsored by Ivory Soap.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Laura Dean Dutton
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Ed Herlihy) -- Opening statement (Ralph Edwards) -- Ralph Edwards introduces the contestants -- Game show competition -- Ralph Edwards introduces Laura Dean Dutton -- Ivory Soap jingle (Laura Dean Dutton) -- Ivory Soap commercial (Ed Herlihy) -- Game show competition [continued in part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: National Broadcasting Company; Truth or consequences (Radio program); Herlihy, Ed; Edwards, Ralph, 1913-2005
